addTradingContract(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params.__trading: The address of the trading contract to be added.

params._fees: The initial fees for the trade.
params._leveragedPosition: The size of the leveraged position.

returns._0: The updated fee after applying the referral program.
The address of the callbacks contract.

params.pairIndex: The index of the trading pair.

returns.index: The index of the first empty open limit order.

params.pairIndex: The index of the trading pair.

returns.index: The index of the first empty trade.

params._index: The index of the limit order.
params._pairIndex: The index of the trading pair.

returns._0: OpenLimitOrder struct containing the order details.
An array of OpenLimitOrder structs containing all open limit orders.
An array of pending order IDs.

params._buy: Indicates if it's a buy operation.
params._fullFee: Indicates if the full fee should be applied.
params._usdc: Whether the fee is in USDC.

returns.feeAfterRebate: The fee amount after applying any rebates.

params.index: The index of the limit order.
params.pairIndex: The index of the trading pair.

returns._0: True if an open limit order exists, false otherwise.
Trade struct containing the trade's details.

params._amountReduced: The amount by which the trade is reduced.

removeTradingContract(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params.__trading: The address of the trading contract to be removed.

params.orderId: The ID of the pending limit order.

returns._0: PendingLimitOrder struct containing the order's details.

params.orderId: The ID of the pending market order.

returns._0: PendingMarketOrder struct containing the order's details.

requestGov(address).details: Only callable by the current governance.

setCallbacks(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params.__callbacks: The address of the new callbacks contract.

setDev(address).details: Only callable by the current governance.

setGov(address).details: Only callable by the current governance.

setGovTreasury(address).details: Only callable by the current governance.

setMaxPendingMarketOrders(uint256).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params._maxPendingMarketOrders: The new maximum number of pending market orders.

setMaxTradesPerPair(uint256).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params._maxTradesPerPair: The new maximum number of trades per pair.

setPriceAggregator(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params._aggregator: The address of the new price aggregator.

setReferral(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params._refferal: The address of the new referral contract.

setTrading(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params.__trading: The address of the new trading contract.

setTvlCap(uint256).details: Can only be called by the governor.

setVaultManager(address).details: Can only be called by the governor.

params._vaultManager: The address of the new vault manager.

params.o: Details of the open limit order.

params._limitOrder: Details of the pending limit order.
params._orderId: The ID for the pending limit order.

storePendingMarketOrder(((address,uint25.details: Can only be called by trading contract.

params._id: The ID associated with the pending market order.
params._open: Specifies whether the order opens a new position.
params._order: Details of the pending market order.

storeTrade((address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Can only be called by trading contract.

params._trade: The details of the trade to store.

returns._0: The address of the trading contract.

params._order: The ID for the pending limit order to unregister.

params._id: The ID associated with the pending market order.
params._open: Specifies whether the order opens or closes a position.

unregisterTrade(address,uint256,uint256).details: Can only be called by trading contract.

params._o: Details of the updated open limit order.

returns._0: The total open interest in the trader's wallet.

addTradingContract(address).notice: Adds a new trading contract to the list of approved trading contracts.

applyReferral(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Applies the referral program during the opening of a trade.

callbacks().notice: Gets the address of the contract that implements callbacks.

claimFees().notice: Allows the governance to claim the accumulated governance fees.

claimRebate().notice: Allows a referrer to claim their rebate.

firstEmptyOpenLimitIndex(address,uint256.notice: Finds the first empty open limit order index for a trader and pair index.

firstEmptyTradeIndex(address,uint256).notice: Finds the first empty trade index for a trader and pair index.

forceUnregisterPendingMarketOrder(uint25.notice: This is used as last resort in case a trader's collateral get stuck in storage

getOpenLimitOrder(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Retrieves a specific open limit order for a trader and pair index.

getPendingOrderIds(address).notice: Retrieves the IDs of pending orders for a specific trader.

handleDevGovFees(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Handles the calculation and distribution of development and governance fees.

hasOpenLimitOrder(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Checks if a trader has an open limit order at a specific index and pair index.

maxOpenInterest().notice: Calculates the maximum open interest based on tvl cap

openTrades(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves an open trade for a specific trader and pair index.

openTradesCount(address,uint256).notice: Retrieves the count of open trades for a specific trader and pair index.

pairOI(uint256).notice: Retrieves the total open interest for a specific pair index.

pairTradersArray(uint256).notice: Retrieves the array of traders for a specific pair index.

pendingOrderIdsCount(address).notice: Retrieves the count of pending order IDs for a specific trader.

registerPartialTrade(address,uint256,uin.notice: Registers a partial trade and updates trade information accordingly.

removeTradingContract(address).notice: Removes a trading contract from the list of approved trading contracts.

reqIDpendingLimitOrder(uint256).notice: Retrieves pending limit order details by order ID.

reqIDpendingMarketOrder(uint256).notice: Retrieves pending market order details by order ID.

setDev(address).notice: Updates the wallet recieveing developer share of fees

setGovTreasury(address).notice: Updates the wallet recieveing gov share of fees

setMaxPendingMarketOrders(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum number of pending market orders.

setMaxTradesPerPair(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum number of trades allowed per trading pair.

setTvlCap(uint256).notice: Sets the TVL cap that be borrowed from LP tranches

setUSDC(address).notice: Updates the USDC token contract address.

storePendingLimitOrder((address,uint256,.notice: Stores a new pending limit order.

storePendingMarketOrder(((address,uint25.notice: Stores a new pending market order and updates associated counters.

storeTrade((address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Stores a new trade and updates the associated trade information.

trading().notice: Gets the address of the contract that manages user facingtrading.

transferUSDC(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers USDC tokens between addresses. USDC intermediately sits in trading storage  before moving to vault

unregisterPendingMarketOrder(uint256,boo.notice: Unregisters a pending market order and updates counters.

unregisterTrade(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Unregisters a trade and deletes trade information accordingly.

updateOpenLimitOrder((address,uint256,ui.notice: Updates an existing open limit order.

updateSl(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Updates the stop loss level for a trade.

updateTp(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Updates the take profit level for a trade.

updateTrade((address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Updates the details of an existing trade.

walletOI(address).notice: Retrieves the total open interest for a specific trader's wallet.
